Text:
Hi Adapa & Mods,

Hiest is my cousin, 
as he requested in the suprbay forum, kindly block my account,
I am out for a while and i will not be able to upload anything for quite some time.

I understand that i should have requested myself for blocking my account,
Sorry for the inconvenience caused,
I will make an account in suprbay and request according to the TPB rules.

Thanks for the support and cooperation:)
